articleIntroduction.title: TALENT MANAGEMENT: PLAYING FOR KEEPS
articleIntroduction.abstract: In this environment, senior finance executives need to take ownersip of the talent agenda. They need to consider the implications of business changes on their staff. They need to ensure that resources are in place to meet business needs, now and in the future. And they must respect the divergent needs of their people, for example, as transaction-oriented service providers or strategic business partners.
articleIntroduction.shortDescription: Senior finance executives need to take ownership of the talent agenda
